name: backbone.nested-types
description: backbone.js extension adding type annotations to model attributes, easiest possible way of dealing with nested models and collections, and native properties for attributes. Providing you with a more or less complete, simple, and powerful object system for JavaScript.
author: Vlad Balin <https://github.com/gaperton>

scripts.make:win: node_modules\.bin\browserify -x underscore -x backbone -r ./src/main:nestedtypes > ./src/_bundle.js && type .\src\copyright.js .\src\umd-head.js .\src\_bundle.js .\src\umd-tail.js > .\nestedtypes.js && type .\src\copyright.js .\src\umd-head-chaplin.js .\src\_bundle.js .\src\umd-tail.js > .\chaplinjs\nestedtypes.js && del .\src\_bundle.js
scripts.build:win: npm test && npm run make:win && npm run minify:win
scripts.make: node_modules/.bin/browserify -x underscore -x backbone -r ./src/main:nestedtypes > ./src/_bundle.js && cat ./src/copyright.js ./src/umd-head.js ./src/_bundle.js ./src/umd-tail.js > ./nestedtypes.js && ./src/copyright.js cat ./src/umd-head-chaplin.js ./src/_bundle.js ./src/umd-tail.js > ./chaplinjs/nestedtypes.js && rm ./src/_bundle.js
scripts.build: npm test && npm run make && npm run minify
